> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cJrbFUFE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-01T23:36:07.660+0000)

> 
> It will still be here when nobody even remembers Fortnite.

I'm not saying Fortnite is the hot new thing that will throw LoL to the side, but LoL is in fact waning in popularity. Many youtubers and streamers have stopped putting content on their channels (except for the professionals, who don't play real life league), making the game seem too hardcore for the potential newcomer. Hell, VideoGameDunkey, who was League's biggest youtuber, makes videos dissing League.
With this in mind, League probably hit its peak. The only way it can go now is down.

How the fuck did you get this argument

> "League is not dying dude its always the number 1"

and not have seen the *much* more popular counterargument 

> Fortnite is a new hype train that will be dead in 6 months.

We literally see your kind of posts every time a new game comes out and you people always get the same response. What a dumb post :/

Fortnite is also the latest fad game, is much more accessible for normies and children, and happens to have a very big name player in the form of the rapper Drake who plays it.

Plenty of games have beaten out League on Twitch in the short-term, but I've not seen a game have as much staying power on Twitch as League.

Hun, the two games aren't related.

You might as well say Mayonnaise is killing League.

Fortnite is currently losing to LoL, 350k to 276k

Fortnite is a fad game that has blown up in a very short period of time. It is **very** relevant in search engines right now (which explains why streamers and youtubers are making momentary switches to fortnite, it's to gain more viewers). It also appeals to a very wide, mostly untapped child audience, one that LoL has no hope of getting into. 

People said tha OW was killing league, but OW is currently getting almost a seventh of LoL's viewers.
I love how people are comparing an FPS to a MOBA.
Fortnite will be overtaken by PUBG again within 3 months. Then slowly die.
